name: Super Pixel Racers
description: Featuring simple and satisfying drifting and nitro mechanics, Super Pixel Racers lets players race it out in numerous modes from classic Rally to pixelated mayhem in Takedown.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 Processor: Intel Core i3 / i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 / Radeon R7 250 or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Direct Sound
